1.0.1.name: wordpress/wp-persian
1.0.1.description:
Advanced Jalali and Farsi language support for Wordpress.

  • Full posts' and comments' dates' conversion.
  • Jalali Monthly Archive template tag.
  • Jalali Calendar template tag.
  • Jalali/Gregorian compatible permalinks.
  • Jalali Archive/Calendar fully customized widgets.
  • customizable through specific Wordpress admin page.
  • Jalali timestamp edit in new post and new page sections
  • Jalali dates in edit tables
  • Change wordpress language from admin control panel.
